Message:
“Be a ruler who can
protect the weak.”
That was the lesson
I learned from my parents.

But, I failed to live up
to what they taught me.
I lost everything,
and was the only one
left alive.

I fell into despair,
but the one who saved me
was Her Holiness, the Pope.

Everyone has a small
glimmer of light inside them.

When they’re happy.
When they’re having fun.
When they’ve met
the one they love.

That light fills their
hearts with warmth.

And there’s someone who
can take their own light
and share it with everyone.

Someone whose kindness
towards others can illuminate
anyone’s path.
